name: The end of the man
description: Here’s the final part of the Godot toy series — The end of the Man. We’ve seen him as a boy, we’ve met him as an aging man, and with this release it’s time to say goodbye. It’s more of a sclptural piece than a toy, size of the figure is 22 by 15 cm (9x6 in) which makes it almost a life size piece. The figure made of unglazed bisque porcelain. Worldwide shipping is free.

name: The End of the Man mini
description: Here’s the final part of the Godot toy series — The end of the Man. We’ve seen him as a boy, we’ve met him as an aging man, and with this release it’s time to say goodbye. It’s a mini version of the original piece. The figure size is 7 by 4cm (3x1.5 in) The figure made of unglazed bisque porcelain. Worldwide shipping is free.

name: Preserver bird
description:
Legend says that giant birds called Preservers was built to save people from erupting volcanoes and earthquakes. Those colossal constructions was built to absorb excess energy of the earth with help of engineering and magic.

The Preserver set contains of a bird and a dish made of unglazed bisque porcelain. The bird size is 13 by 13cm (5x5in). You could hold sweet little things inside, burn candles or incense cones inside of it.
 
Worldwide shipping is free.

name: MOON CAT
description: Moon cats are mysterious sleeping floating creatures met by Gooma on his way to deep north. They float with the moon light and existing only at the night part of the world. Figure size: 10 cm / 4 in Moon Cat Review at ToysRevil Rotocasted.com toy page Please note, as a handmade work of art, this figure might contain small imperfections. Worldwide shipping included.

name: Moon Fox
description: Moon foxes are mysterious sleeping floating creatures met by Gooma on his way to deep north. They float with the moon light and exist only at the night part of the world. Figure size: 10 cm / 4 inches Material: Resin Moon Wanderers shot by Brian McCarty Paper Moon Story Rotocasted.com toy page Free worldwide shipping.

name: Moon Mouse
description: Moon Mouses are mysterious sleeping floating creatures met by Gooma on his way to deep north. They float with the moon light and existing only at the night part of the world. Figure size: 9 cm / 3,5 in Free worldwide shipping.

name: Kluth: Silhouette edition
description: Kluth are mysterious sea creature in his boat of ice roaming at night in search of his home city underwater R'Lyeh. Figure size: 10 cm / 4 in Kluth Review at Reduced figuration Rotocasted.com toy page Please note, as a handmade work of art, this figure might contain small imperfections. Worldwide shipping included.

name: Govra the deity of the End
description:
Gooma world is full of gods, spirits, ghosts and deities of all kinds.

One of them is Govra, the deity of the End. If you’re lucky, you can find her where something ends – at end of the road, see her at the end of the day or you can meet her when something dies. Govra has the large number of cultist followers, who build altars and praise her sacrificig sandglasses and rotten fruits.

—

Govra sculpture made of resin and it’s one of my largest releases to date, it’s towering about 17cm (7in).

Worldwide shipping included.

name: Godot: Lime Candy
description: The name Godot is pronounced in Britain and Ireland with the emphasis on the first syllable, /ˈɠɒdoʊ/; in North America it is usually pronounced with an emphasis on the second syllable, /ɠəˈdoʊ/. The figure is named after a character of Samuel Beckett's play "Waiting for Godot", in which two characters, Vladimir and Estragon, wait for someone named Godot who never shows in and whos identity remain mystery. Figures size: 12 cm / about 4.5 inches Material: Resin How I made a Godot video: Part 1 Part 2. Please note, as a handmade work of art, this figure might contain small imperfections. Worldwide shipping included.
